title: Need More Space? This 2 Story - 4 Bedroom Will Be Perfect For You!
posting_body: - LOTS of storage space throughout the house
- Private neighborhood walking trails, children's playground, and fishing pond
- Safe and peaceful neighborhood with endless amenities
Let us show you how affordable homeownership can be!
Call us today to schedule a one-on-one appointment to learn more!
If you'd like to respond by email, please send your contact information.
*P & I. Price $559,900, 5.875% Fixed/5.931% APR, 20% Down, CONV 30 Year, OAC from third party lender.
Prices and rates are subject to change without notice.
Home pictured may display decorator items and furniture which are not available for purchase even upon additional payment.
Please consult an LGI Homes new home consultant and review a home sales contract for additional information and disclosures.
